name: MIDLANTIC NATIONAL BANK v. John F. STEELE, International Yacht and Ship Brokers, Inc. Appeal of John F. STEELE

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
parties: MIDLANTIC NATIONAL BANK v. John F. STEELE, International Yacht and Ship Brokers, Inc. Appeal of John F. STEELE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Scott D. Patterson, Lillian S. Kachmar, Philadelphia, for appellant.
George A. Pagano, F. Michael Friedman, Media, for Midlantic Nat. Bank.
casebody.head_matter:
569 A.2d 351
MIDLANTIC NATIONAL BANK v. John F. STEELE, International Yacht and Ship Brokers, Inc. Appeal of John F. STEELE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 25, 1990.
Decided Feb. 6, 1990.
Scott D. Patterson, Lillian S. Kachmar, Philadelphia, for appellant.
George A. Pagano, F. Michael Friedman, Media, for Midlantic Nat. Bank.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
